wikipedia_page.main:
John Pearse (?1760–1836), of 50 Lincoln's Inn Fields, Middlesex and Chilton Lodge, near Hungerford, Berkshire, was an English politician.
He was a Member (MP) of the Parliament of the United Kingdom for Devizes 1818 to 1832.Pearse also served as a director of the Bank of England (1790–1791, 1793–1808 and 1812–1828), as its  deputy governor (1808–1810) and finally as its governor (1810–1812).
